training_data.prompt: What is the purpose of the CPlus_Ardenius custom node for ComfyUI?
training_data.completion: The CPlus_Ardenius custom node for ComfyUI is a control box that allows users to have control over their workflow.

training_data.prompt: How can I help support the development of free custom nodes and other software?
training_data.completion: You can help support the development of free custom nodes and other software by making a donation at the [Coffee Page](https://ko-fi.com/ardenius).

training_data.prompt: What features does the CPlus control box provide for the model and prompts input?
training_data.completion: The CPlus control box provides features such as model, positive, negative, latent image, seed, width, height, cfg, steps, denoise, scaler, clip, and vae for the model and prompts input.

training_data.prompt: Where can I find the download link for the CPlus control box for ComfyUI?
training_data.completion: You can find the download link for the CPlus control box for ComfyUI at the following link: [Donload link CPlus control box for ComfyUI](https://ko-fi.com/s/2e67e2ae70).

training_data.prompt: How do I manually install the CPlus control box custom node for ComfyUI?
training_data.completion: To manually install the CPlus control box custom node for ComfyUI, you should follow these steps: 1. Click on the green button above (Code). 2. Download the zip file. 3. Extract the zip file. 4. Copy the contents to ComfyUI/custom-nodes/. 5. Restart your ComfyUI server. 6. Click (refersh) on the Comfy UI panel. 7. Double-click anywhere on your workflow and search for CPlus control box.
